general.question: What is MedConnect?
general.answer: MedConnect is a healthcare platform that connects patients with providers for appointments, consultations, and record management.

general.question: Is MedConnect free to use?
general.answer: Yes, MedConnect is free for patients. Certain premium services or specialist consultations may have associated costs.

general.question: How do I create an account?
general.answer: Click “Sign Up” on the homepage, fill in your personal details, verify your email, and you’re all set!

general.question: Can I use MedConnect on my phone?
general.answer: Absolutely. Our website is fully responsive, and we also have a dedicated mobile app available on both iOS and Android.

appointments.question: How do I book an appointment?
appointments.answer: Log in to your MedConnect account, navigate to “Book Appointment,” choose your preferred doctor and time slot, then confirm.

appointments.question: Why don’t I see some time slots?
appointments.answer: Time slots may be unavailable if the doctor is already booked, outside working hours, or it’s too close to the appointment date/time.

appointments.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
appointments.answer: Yes. Go to “My Appointments,” click “Reschedule” next to the appointment you wish to change, pick a new date/time, and confirm.

appointments.question: What happens if I cancel my appointment?
appointments.answer: If you cancel more than 24 hours in advance, no fees apply. Cancellations within 24 hours might incur a small fee.

appointments.question: How do I join a virtual consultation?
appointments.answer: At your scheduled time, go to “My Appointments” and click “Join Live Chat” next to the appointment. You’ll be connected to the doctor via our secured video link.

account.question: How do I change my email address?
account.answer: Go to “My Profile” → “Account Settings,” click “Edit Email,” enter the new email, and verify it through the link we send you.

account.question: Can I delete my MedConnect account?
account.answer: Yes, email support@medconnect.com with “Delete My Account” in the subject, and we will guide you through the process.

account.question: How do I enable dark mode?
account.answer: Click your profile avatar → “Appearance Settings,” then toggle “Dark Mode” on or off at the bottom.

account.question: How do I reset my password?
account.answer: On the login page, click “Forgot Password,” enter your email address, and follow the reset link we send you.
